name: Unnamed Platformer engine
description:
This itch page will be the hub for this project to be tested by anyone that can be bothered. If you encounter any bug, it would mean the world to me if you could report it. Same goes for any suggestion you may have. I'm still working out itch, so comments will do for now.

ver. a10 is the first public build, main priority is getting the movement down, specifically the jump. So for now you run at max speed and turn on a dime.

CONTROLSGamepadKeyboardMOVE D-pad or left joystickArrow keysJUMPSouth or East buttonX  key
